item.title: 收益率上升吸引投资者，借款人急于抛售日元债券
item.description: 借款人在本周日本债券收益率飙升中找到了一线希望，较高的利率吸引了信贷投资者。【原文：Borrowers are finding a silver lining in this week’s surge in Japanese bond yields with higher rates attracting credit investors.】

item.title: 简街在印度期权交易浪潮中获利 23 亿美元
item.description: Jane Street Group LLC 去年在印度的股票衍生品净收入超过 23 亿美元，其利润丰厚的交易策略引发了监管机构的调查。【原文：Jane Street Group LLC generated more than $2.3 billion in net revenue from equity derivatives last year in India, where its lucrative trading strategies have sparked a probe by regulators.】

item.title: 人工智能 "洗衣机 "无法夸大其词
item.description:
一家高歌猛进的初创公司的倒闭可能标志着在幕后秘密利用人类的做法在更大范围内的衰落。【原文：

The collapse of a high-flying startup may mark a broader decline in the practice of secretly using humans behind a curtain. 

】

item.title: 加纳将维持关键利率以加速通货紧缩
item.description: 加纳中央银行将继续采取紧缩的货币政策立场，以加快通货紧缩的步伐，实现年底目标。【原文：Ghana’s central bank is set to continue its tight monetary policy stance to hasten the pace of disinflation toward its year-end target.】

item.title: 特朗普主动与日本石破茂通话，讨论关税问题
item.description: 就在日本首相石破茂前往美国参加新一轮贸易谈判之际，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普与日本首相石破茂通了电话，大致讨论了关税问题。【原文：US President Donald Trump initiated a phone call with Japanese Prime Minister Shigeru Ishiba and discussed tariffs in general terms, just as Tokyo’s top negotiator left for the US for another round of trade talks.】

item.title: 皮尤什-戈亚尔表示，印度与美国举行了 "建设性 "贸易谈判
item.description: 印度商务部长皮尤什-戈亚尔（Piyush Goyal）表示，他与印度商务部长霍华德-卢特尼克（Howard Lutnick）进行了 "建设性会晤"，以达成两国间互惠互利的贸易协定。【原文：India’s Commerce Minister Piyush Goyal said that he had a “constructive meeting” with his counterpart Howard Lutnick for a mutually beneficial trade agreement between the two countries.】

item.title: 电视辩论后韩国总统竞选形势急剧紧张
item.description: 周五公布的最新民意调查显示，韩国总统候选人李在明在竞选活动中的领先优势大幅缩小，因为保守派执政党的金文洙在双方首次电视辩论后取得了领先优势。【原文：South Korean presidential candidate Lee Jae-myung saw his lead in the election campaign narrow sharply in the latest opinion poll released Friday as the conservative ruling party’s Kim Moon-soo made up ground after their first TV debate.】

item.title: 印尼选拔新任税务和海关总署署长应对税收下滑
item.description: 在税收收入急剧下降的情况下，印度尼西亚任命了税务和海关部门的新负责人。【原文：Indonesia appointed new heads for its tax and customs offices amid a sharp decline in revenue collections.】

item.title: 投资者反弹后巴西收回离岸基金税
item.description: 巴西财政部取消了向离岸基金转移资金征税的计划，而这一征税计划的宣布仅仅几个小时就导致了巴西货币的大跌。【原文：Brazil’s Finance Ministry scrapped plans to tax transfers to offshore funds only hours after the announcement of the levy led to a selloff in the currency.】

item.title: 印度银行贷款增速为 2022 年以来最慢
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 中国退出美国玉米市场使亚洲其他国家的玉米价格下降
item.description: 中国不再购买美国玉米，使其他亚洲买家受益，因为更便宜的美国供应流入了更广阔的市场，撼动了用于动物饲料和生物燃料的谷物的竞争。【原文：China’s shift away from US corn is benefiting other Asian buyers as cheaper American supply flows into the broader market, shaking up competition for the grain used in animal feed and biofuels.】

item.title: 比亚迪经销商倒闭显示中国汽车业的财务之痛
item.description: 自上个月以来，中国已有两个省份的汽车经销集团倒闭，这两家公司都是比亚迪股份有限公司的零售商，这证明了中国汽车市场的激烈竞争，也证明了即使销售中国第一品牌也无法使企业免于财务困境。【原文：Car dealership groups in two provinces have gone out of business since last month in China, both of them BYD Co. retailers, evidence of the tough competition in the nation’s auto market and proof that not even selling the country’s No. 1 brand can shield businesses from financial difficulties.】

item.title: 中国美团和小米的长期扩张努力受到关注
item.description: 美团和小米公司的长期雄心和投资计划将主导下周的财报发布，继续影响中国科技行业的情绪。【原文：Meituan and Xiaomi Corp.’s long-term ambitions and investment plans will dominate next week’s earnings releases, continuing to shape sentiment for China’s tech sector.】

item.title: 香港地产大亨在葡萄酒拍卖会上拍得 930 万美元
item.description: 香港商人约瑟夫-刘（Joseph Lau）在一次拍卖会上以 7290 万港元（约合 930 万美元）的价格售出了一批名酒，其中一些罕见的法国年份酒每瓶售价超过 41000 美元。【原文：Hong Kong businessman Joseph Lau sold a collection of fine wine for HK$72.9 million ($9.3 million) in an auction, fetching more than $41,000 a bottle for some rare French vintages.】

item.title: 美中高级官员誓言保持沟通渠道畅通
item.description: 北京和华盛顿继续保持高层接触，双方高级官员周四通了电话，这表明双方在本月早些时候达成贸易休战协议后仍在保持积极沟通。【原文：Beijing and Washington continued high-level contact with a Thursday call between senior officials, a sign that the two sides are maintaining active communications following their trade truce earlier this month.】

item.title: 日元走软提振日本股市反弹，石油股下跌
item.description: 美国采购经理人指数改善后日元贬值，促使半导体和汽车等出口相关行业出现买盘，日本股市随之反弹。由于原油价格下跌，矿业等与石油相关的股票表现疲软。【原文：Japanese stocks staged a rebound after the yen depreciated following an improvement in the US Purchasing Managers’ Index, prompting buying in export-related sectors such as semiconductors and automobiles. Oil-related stocks such as mining showed weakness as crude oil prices declined.】

item.title: 路透社称，OnlyFans 正在商谈以 80 亿美元估值出售事宜
item.description: 据路透社报道，洛杉矶一家投资公司正在讨论收购 OnlyFans 有限公司，该交易对该网站的估值为 80 亿美元。【原文：A Los Angeles investment firm is in discussions to buy out OnlyFans Ltd. in a deal that values the site at $8 billion, Reuters reported.】

item.title: 特朗普团队在委内瑞拉问题上的 "权力游戏 "鞭笞雪佛龙公司
item.description: 本周，特朗普政府仅用了 24 小时就在委内瑞拉问题上做出了最新的反转，白宫闭门造车的分歧一触即发，雪佛龙公司（Chevron Corp.【原文：It took barely 24 hours this week for the Trump administration to execute its latest reversal on Venezuela, with the fate of a huge Chevron Corp. venture hanging in the balance as closed-door White House differences broke into the open.】

item.title: 艾尔登指环》真人电影正在制作中，由亚历克斯-加兰执导
item.description: A24 电影公司和万代南梦宫娱乐公司将与《机械姬》（Ex Machina）导演亚历克斯-加兰（Alex Garland）合作，根据奇幻角色扮演游戏《艾尔登魔戒》（Elden Ring）改编拍摄真人电影。【原文：A24 Films and Bandai Namco Entertainment Inc. will work with Ex Machina director Alex Garland on a live-action film based on the fantasy role-playing game Elden Ring.】

item.title: 日本赤泽将访美参加第三轮美国贸易谈判
item.description: 日本最高贸易谈判代表赤泽亮世将于周五启程前往美国，与特朗普政府进行第三轮贸易谈判。【原文：Japan’s top trade negotiator Ryosei Akazawa will leave Friday for the US for a third round of trade talks with the Trump administration.】

item.title: 日本 CPI 回升、大米价格上涨给石破带来压力
item.description: 日本的主要通胀指标创下两年多来的最快增速，大米价格飙升加剧了首相石破茂的麻烦，此前他的农业部长就日本的主食发表了有争议的言论，导致内阁动荡。【原文：Japan’s key inflation gauge accelerated to the fastest clip in more than two years, with soaring rice prices exacerbating Prime Minister Shigeru Ishiba’s troubles after a cabinet shakeup over controversial comments by his agricultural chief on the nation’s staple food.】

item.title: 欧佩克+考虑再次大幅增加供应，石油将出现周度下跌
item.description: 由于欧佩克+组织（OPEC+）考虑再次大举增产，这可能会增加市场供应，而市场本已预期将面临供应过剩的局面，石油将迎来三周以来的首次下跌。【原文：Oil headed for its first weekly decline in three, as OPEC+ weighed another bumper production increase that could add supplies into a market already expected to face a glut.】

item.title: 英国消费者信心因降息和美国贸易协议而上升
item.description: 一项新的调查显示，英国消费者信心在 5 月份略有回升，原因是英国央行放宽了借贷成本，而且政府官员与美国达成了贸易协议。【原文：UK consumer confidence rebounded slightly in May, a new survey showed, as the Bank of England eased borrowing costs and government officials struck a trade deal with the US.】

item.title: 一元店将推动马来西亚 IPO，成为本年度最大的上市企业
item.description: 折扣连锁店 Eco-Shop Marketing Bhd 周五在马来西亚上市，这将是马来西亚今年最大的首次公开募股，将造就一位亿万富翁。【原文：Discount-chain Eco-Shop Marketing Bhd. debuts in Malaysia on Friday in a listing that’s set to create a billionaire after the nation’s biggest initial public offering of the year.】

item.title: 阿根廷向投资者发出信号：尽管有储备金，国际货币基金组织仍将提供现金
item.description: 阿根廷官员上周在伦敦向投资者表示，无论他们在新计划实施几个月后是否未能达到重建外汇储备的目标，他们都希望下个月能从国际货币基金组织获得 20 亿美元的拨款。【原文：Argentine officials signaled to investors in London last week they expect to receive a $2 billion disbursement from the International Monetary Fund next month regardless of whether they miss a target for rebuilding foreign reserves just a few months into a new program.】

item.title: 美国政府债务和美元上涨，黄金维持跌势
item.description: 黄金在本周首次下跌后企稳，因为一些交易商转向长期美国政府债券和美元，而不是贵金属。【原文：Gold steadied after its first decline this week, as some traders turned to long-term US government bonds and the dollar instead of the precious metal.】

item.title: 中国顶级制药商恒瑞开始在香港交易
item.description: 江苏恒瑞医药股份有限公司是中国市值最大的制药企业，随着亚洲金融中心上市热潮的兴起，该公司在筹集了 99 亿港元（13 亿美元）资金后，将于周五在香港开始交易。【原文：Jiangsu Hengrui Pharmaceuticals Co., China’s largest drugmaker by market value, is set to begin trading in Hong Kong Friday after raising HK$9.9 billion ($1.3 billion) as listings pick up in the Asian financial hub.】

item.title: 美元和国债反弹，亚洲股市将上涨
item.description: 周五，亚洲股票期货走高，国债和美元反弹，表明本周早些时候震撼市场的美国财政担忧有所平息。美国股市变化不大。【原文：Asian equity futures edged higher Friday amid a rebound in Treasuries and the dollar in a sign of calming US fiscal fears that rocked markets earlier in the week. US stocks were little changed.】

item.title: 美元和国债反弹，亚洲股市将上涨：市场综述
item.description: 周五，亚洲股票期货走高，国债和美元反弹，表明本周早些时候震撼市场的美国财政担忧有所平息。美国股市变化不大。【原文：Asian equity futures edged higher Friday amid a rebound in Treasuries and the dollar in a sign of calming US fiscal fears that rocked markets earlier in the week. US stocks were little changed.】

item.title: 拉加德称国际贸易将今非昔比
item.description: 欧洲中央银行行长克里斯蒂娜-拉加德（Christine Lagarde）警告说，尽管世界主要经济体正朝着某种妥协的方向迈进，但国际贸易将因关税紧张局势而永远改变。【原文：European Central Bank President Christine Lagarde warned that international trade will be changed forever by the tensions over tariffs, even as the world’s leading economies edge toward some compromises.】
